title: Requirements Phase: system-extension-activation - Ready for Review
response:
Feedback Summary (1 comments):

General Comments:
1. Users shouldn't have to manually install the System Extension. It should either happen automatically as part of the brew install process or when the daemon first activates.

comments.comment: Users shouldn't have to manually install the System Extension. It should either happen automatically as part of the brew install process or when the daemon first activates.
